newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokio Marine rebounds in morning trade.
newsitem.headline: Tokio Marine rebounds in morning trade.

text.p: Shares of Tokio Marine & Fire Insurance Co Ltd rose on the Tokyo Stock Exchange on Thursday morning after having been sold earlier this week, traders said.
"Tokio Marine shares were sold on expectations that the company's earnings would worsen following the settlement of the Japan-U.S. insurance talks," one trader said.
"But they have fallen to a level at which some investors are starting to think that they are relatively cheap. Foreign investors are placing buy orders today," he said.
Tokio Marine shares were up 30 yen to 1,060 by 0108 GMT. Turnover was 1.88 million shares.
